LanguageData.CookMealSimpleDa.label: Cooking ten pieces of simple meal
LanguageData.CookMealSimpleDa.description: Cooks a straightforward meal from one ingredient.
LanguageData.CookMealFineDa.label: Cook ten fine meal
LanguageData.CookMealFineDa.description: Cooks a somewhat complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients.
LanguageData.CookMealLavishDa.label: Cooking ten lavish meal
LanguageData.CookMealLavishDa.description: Cooks a very complex meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
LanguageData.CookMealSurvivalDa.label: Cooking ten packaged survival meal
LanguageData.CookMealSurvivalDa.description: Cooks a packaged survival meal from a combination of raw meat and raw plant ingredients. Much of the ingredients are wasted.
LanguageData.CookLianxi.label: Practice cooking
LanguageData.CookLianxi.description: Use two simple meal to practice cooking skills.
LanguageData.CookZhiwudanbai.label: Synthetic plant protein
LanguageData.CookZhiwudanbai.description: The protein in the plant is synthesized from chicken.
